description: Complex pivot affecting parent issue and multiple sub-issues

analysis.change_summary: User wants to split the database migration into two phases and add caching support

update_sections.Requirements:
- Database migration (split into schema and data phases)
- Add caching layer
- Maintain backward compatibility

remove_unchecked_todos: Run full migration in single transaction

new_sub_issues.title: [Phase 3]: Implement caching layer
new_sub_issues.description:
## Description

Add caching support to improve performance after migration.

## Affected Areas

- `src/cache/` (create) - Cache implementation
- `src/api/` (modify) - Add cache integration

output.summary_for_user:

- Modified sub-issue #101: added rollback support todo, removed single-transaction todo
- Modified sub-issue #102: added batch migration todo
- Created new sub-issue for Phase 3: caching layer
